item.title: Convert Windows Machine to Windows VM in KVM
item.description: Convert Windows Machine to Windows VM in KVM Export to windows VM Disk2vhd v2.01 Convert to QEMU KVM Converting between image formats Converting Virtual Machines from Other Hypervisors to KVM with virt-v2v in RHEL 7 Keyboard was not working initially use oskb - on screen keyboard - to enter password or such go to control panel > programs
